answerText: The Winter's Tale [do not accept "A Winter's Tale"][10] This lost daughter of Leontes and Hermione is raised as a shepherd. She eventually marries Prince Florizel.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 4 | 6 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The thief Autolycus rips off one character in this play by claiming he just got mugged by the thief Autolycus. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which King Leontes jealously imprisons his wife Hermione, but then takes her back in the fifth act when she reappears posing as a statue.
